description: Grand Theft Auto IV: The Complete Edition offers an action-adventure experience within Liberty City, a metropolis driven by money and status. The game follows the intertwined lives of Niko Bellic, seeking a new beginning; Johnny Klebitz, a biker caught in a gang war; and Luis Lopez, navigating loyalties within the city's criminal underworld. Players engage in narrative-driven gameplay as these characters struggle to survive amidst pervasive violence and corruption. The Complete Edition encompasses Grand Theft Auto IV and its expansions, The Lost and Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony.

Guild Wars 2 is a free-to-play Massively Multiplayer online Role-Playing Game focused on exploration and discovery within an open world. Players can embark on adventures, discover landmarks, and interact with characters who have their own stories and goals, with rewards for completing renown hearts and dynamic events. Collaboration is encouraged, as players can assist others without forming parties to tackle challenges like jumping puzzles or world bosses, and experience points are earned through various activities such as reviving players or gathering resources. Character progression involves acquiring and wielding an arsenal of new weapons, with each profession offering unique playstyles refined through hundreds of unlockable skills and traits. Structured player-versus-player (PvP) modes are available, where all competitors are leveled and equipped to ensure fair competition. Deep character customization includes extensive cosmetic options, allowing players to express themselves through weapon and armor skins, and thousands of dye combinations. Expansions introduce new Masteries, including gliding, mounts with special movement skills, fishing, and skiff piloting, alongside elite specializations that unlock new weapon choices and abilities. The revenant profession allows players to channel historical figures from Tyria's past. Living World seasons continue the narrative between expansions, offering new explorable zones and rewards. Genres include Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, and Free To Play.

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell is an action game set in a world of espionage where players, as elite covert agent Sam Fisher of the NSA's Third Echelon, must infiltrate secure locations to gather intelligence, uncover conspiracies, and prevent global catastrophes threatened by cyberterrorism and international tensions. The game redefines stealth action with highly interactive environments offering strategic flexibility, allowing for both lethal and non-lethal approaches. Players explore stunning environments powered by the Unreal Engine, featuring dynamic lighting and sound effects that enhance immersion in military espionage. The experience includes over 12 hours of global stealth action with diverse mission objectives that offer replayability, utilizing a Mk V tactical suit and prototype gear for climbing, mantling, interrogating, and sneaking, and earned awards such as E3 2002’s Best Action/Adventure Game and the Game Developers Choice Award for Excellence in Writing.

God of War is an action-adventure RPG set in the Norse realm, where Kratos, years after his vengeance against the Gods of Olympus, lives as a man among Norse gods and monsters, fighting for survival and teaching his son, Atreus, the same. This harsh world introduces a new pantheon of creatures, monsters, and gods, contrasting with the ornate marble of Olympus. Combat is visceral and physical, viewed from an over-the-shoulder perspective, featuring new weapons and abilities that maintain the series' spirit while innovating conflict mechanics. The PC version offers high-fidelity graphics with true 4K resolution, unlocked framerates, and extensive graphical customization, including support for NVIDIA DLSS and Reflex for enhanced performance and responsiveness. Players can customize controls with various gamepads and mouse/keyboard bindings, and ultra-widescreen support provides an immersive, cinematic experience.

TEKKEN 8, an action fighting game, continues the renowned TEKKEN series with over 32 meticulously detailed characters and their high-resolution models. This installment introduces new battle features such as Heat and Rage Arts for engaging combat, alongside an accessible Special Style control system enabling simple combo execution. Players can experience the longest ongoing storyline in video game history through single-player story mode, customize characters, and engage in arcade challenges. The game facilitates global competition via an interactive online lobby and Ranked Match modes, allowing players to face off against others worldwide. Skill development is supported through fighting against AI-powered Ghosts that learn player styles and by reviewing battle replays for strategic analysis.

Dishonored is an immersive first-person action-adventure game casting players as a supernatural assassin seeking revenge. The game features a flexible combat system allowing creative elimination of targets through a combination of supernatural abilities, weapons, and gadgets, with approaches ranging from stealthy infiltration to direct confrontation. Set in the industrial steampunk city of Dunwall, where technology and otherworldly forces intertwine, players navigate a narrative of betrayal and corruption as the former bodyguard framed for the Empress's murder. The world reacts to player choices, influencing mission outcomes and the overall game experience, allowing for improvisation and innovation in defining a play style. Players can utilize supernatural powers such as teleportation, possession, and time manipulation, which can be upgraded to master new abilities and gadgets within an intriguing, original world.

Brothers - A Tale of Two Sons is an indie action-adventure game that guides players through an epic fairy tale journey. Developed by Starbreeze Studios with direction from Josef Fares, the game features a unique single-player co-op experience where players control two brothers simultaneously, each with a thumbstick. This control scheme facilitates puzzle-solving and navigation through varied locations, as the brothers embark on a quest to find the 'Water of Life' to cure their ailing father. Players will encounter boss battles and must rely on each other's strengths to overcome challenges, highlighting themes of reliance and brotherhood in this unforgettable narrative experience.

Deus Ex: Human Revolution - Director's Cut is an action RPG where players assume the role of Adam Jensen, an ex-SWAT specialist tasked with protecting secrets at an experimental biotechnology firm. Following a violent black ops intrusion, Jensen's mission transforms amidst a near-future society divided by technological augmentations and rife with conspiracy. The game offers a blend of intense shooting, close-quarters combat, and strategic role-playing elements, allowing players to customize Jensen's abilities across stealth, social interaction, hacking, and combat. Player choices have significant consequences, shaping the unfolding narrative through multiple approaches and paths. The Director's Cut features an enhanced storyline integrating additional content and improved boss encounters, with a Newgame+ option for replaying with acquired augmentations.

Grand Theft Auto V Legacy is an action-adventure game that follows a young street hustler, a retired bank robber, and a psychopath entangled with criminal underworld elements, the U.S. government, and the entertainment industry, requiring them to execute dangerous heists for survival in a city where trust is scarce. The PC version offers exploration of Los Santos and Blaine County at resolutions up to 4K and 60 FPS, with extensive customization options for graphics, controls, and population density. The game includes Grand Theft Auto Online, supporting up to 30 players and featuring all released content, including Heists and Adversary modes. Players can experience the world in First Person Mode and utilize the Rockstar Editor, a suite of tools for capturing, editing, and sharing gameplay footage, including Director Mode for staging scenes with characters, pedestrians, and animals, and the ability to add custom soundtracks via Self Radio. The game also features new music from The Lab FM, hosted by The Alchemist and Oh No, with collaborations from artists like Earl Sweatshirt and Killer Mike.

Opus Magnum, an indie simulation game from Zachtronics, invites players to master alchemical engineering through intricate, open-ended puzzles. As Head Alchemist Anataeus Vaya, players utilize the transmutation engine, an advanced alchemical tool, to create vital remedies, precious gemstones, and deadly weapons. The game features machine design, allowing players to build apparatuses with programmable arms, customizable tracks, and esoteric devices to carry out alchemical processes. Players can compete globally for the simplest, fastest, and most compact solutions, exporting animated GIFs of their designs. Steam Workshop integration facilitates sharing and playing user-created puzzles. The narrative unfolds amidst intrigues and dark plots within ancient Houses, where powerful alchemists are highly sought and dangerous. For focused concentration, Sigmar's Garden, an alchemy-based solitaire minigame, offers a break.

Guild Wars 2 is a free-to-play Massively Multiplayer online Role-Playing Game focused on exploration and discovery within an open world. Players can embark on adventures, discover landmarks, and interact with characters who have their own stories and goals, with rewards for completing renown hearts and dynamic events. Collaboration is encouraged, as players can assist others without forming parties to tackle challenges like jumping puzzles or world bosses, and experience points are earned through various activities such as reviving players or gathering resources. Character progression involves acquiring and wielding an arsenal of new weapons, with each profession offering unique playstyles refined through hundreds of unlockable skills and traits. Structured player-versus-player (PvP) modes are available, where all competitors are leveled and equipped to ensure fair competition. Deep character customization includes extensive cosmetic options, allowing players to express themselves through weapon and armor skins, and thousands of dye combinations. Expansions introduce new Masteries, including gliding, mounts with special movement skills, fishing, and skiff piloting, alongside elite specializations that unlock new weapon choices and abilities. The revenant profession allows players to channel historical figures from Tyria's past. Living World seasons continue the narrative between expansions, offering new explorable zones and rewards. Genres include Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, and Free To Play.

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell is an action game set in a world of espionage where players, as elite covert agent Sam Fisher of the NSA's Third Echelon, must infiltrate secure locations to gather intelligence, uncover conspiracies, and prevent global catastrophes threatened by cyberterrorism and international tensions. The game redefines stealth action with highly interactive environments offering strategic flexibility, allowing for both lethal and non-lethal approaches. Players explore stunning environments powered by the Unreal Engine, featuring dynamic lighting and sound effects that enhance immersion in military espionage. The experience includes over 12 hours of global stealth action with diverse mission objectives that offer replayability, utilizing a Mk V tactical suit and prototype gear for climbing, mantling, interrogating, and sneaking, and earned awards such as E3 2002’s Best Action/Adventure Game and the Game Developers Choice Award for Excellence in Writing.

Players can utilize supernatural powers such as teleportation, possession, and time manipulation, which can be upgraded to master new abilities and gadgets within an intriguing, original world.

The game includes Grand Theft Auto Online, supporting up to 30 players and featuring all released content, including Heists and Adversary modes. Players can experience the world in First Person Mode and utilize the Rockstar Editor, a suite of tools for capturing, editing, and sharing gameplay footage, including Director Mode for staging scenes with characters, pedestrians, and animals, and the ability to add custom soundtracks via Self Radio. The game also features new music from The Lab FM, hosted by The Alchemist and Oh No, with collaborations from artists like Earl Sweatshirt and Killer Mike.

METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN, an action-adventure experience from Konami Digital Entertainment, ushers in a new era for the franchise utilizing cutting-edge Fox Engine technology. This installment offers players significant tactical freedom within an open-world design, allowing for varied mission approaches and overall game progression. Set in 1984 during the Cold War, the narrative follows Snake, also known as Big Boss, who awakens from a nine-year coma driven by revenge and establishes a new private army to pursue the shadow group XOF. Its immersive tactical gameplay, open-world structure, and feature-rich design position it as a significant title in the gaming industry.

Out of the Park Baseball 17 is a baseball strategy simulation game that allows players to manage real-world franchises or create fictional baseball universes. As a general manager or field manager, players can guide their favorite MLB teams to glory, manage rosters, lineups, and in-game strategy, or rewrite baseball history by managing teams from almost 150 years past. The game features authentic MLB and MLBPA licenses, including projected Opening Day rosters, complete minor league systems, and future draft classes, with authentic player images and realistic progression. Players can also compete in online leagues. Gameplay encompasses high-level oversight or pitch-by-pitch management, with features like Historical Exhibition mode, historical minor league systems, and AI opponents with individualized approaches to roster management. The game's genres include Indie, Simulation, Sports, and Strategy, offering deep baseball team game management.

Opus Magnum, an indie simulation game from Zachtronics, invites players to master alchemical engineering through intricate, open-ended puzzles. As Head Alchemist Anataeus Vaya, players utilize the transmutation engine, an advanced alchemical tool, to create vital remedies, precious gemstones, and deadly weapons. Guild Wars 2 is a free-to-play Massively Multiplayer online Role-Playing Game focused on exploration and discovery within an open world. Players can embark on adventures, discover landmarks, and interact with characters who have their own stories and goals, with rewards for completing renown hearts and dynamic events. Collaboration is encouraged, as players can assist others without forming parties to tackle challenges like jumping puzzles or world bosses, and experience points are earned through various activities such as reviving players or gathering resources. Character progression involves acquiring and wielding an arsenal of new weapons, with each profession offering unique playstyles refined through hundreds of unlockable skills and traits. Structured player-versus-player (PvP) modes are available, where all competitors are leveled and equipped to ensure fair competition. Deep character customization includes extensive cosmetic options, allowing players to express themselves through weapon and armor skins, and thousands of dye combinations. Expansions introduce new Masteries, including gliding, mounts with special movement skills, fishing, and skiff piloting, alongside elite specializations that unlock new weapon choices and abilities. The revenant profession allows players to channel historical figures from Tyria's past. Living World seasons continue the narrative between expansions, offering new explorable zones and rewards. Genres include Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, and Free To Play.

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell is an action game set in a world of espionage where players, as elite covert agent Sam Fisher of the NSA's Third Echelon, must infiltrate secure locations to gather intelligence, uncover conspiracies, and prevent global catastrophes threatened by cyberterrorism and international tensions. The game redefines stealth action with highly interactive environments offering strategic flexibility, allowing for both lethal and non-lethal approaches. Players explore stunning environments powered by the Unreal Engine, featuring dynamic lighting and sound effects that enhance immersion in military espionage. The experience includes over 12 hours of global stealth action with diverse mission objectives that offer replayability, utilizing a Mk V tactical suit and prototype gear for climbing, mantling, interrogating, and sneaking, and earned awards such as E3 2002’s Best Action/Adventure Game and the Game Developers Choice Award for Excellence in Writing.

God of War is an action-adventure RPG set in the Norse realm, where Kratos, years after his vengeance against the Gods of Olympus, lives as a man among Norse gods and monsters, fighting for survival and teaching his son, Atreus, the same. This harsh world introduces a new pantheon of creatures, monsters, and gods, contrasting with the ornate marble of Olympus. Combat is visceral and physical, viewed from an over-the-shoulder perspective, featuring new weapons and abilities that maintain the series' spirit while innovating conflict mechanics. The PC version offers high-fidelity graphics with true 4K resolution, unlocked framerates, and extensive graphical customization, including support for NVIDIA DLSS and Reflex for enhanced performance and responsiveness. Players can customize controls with various gamepads and mouse/keyboard bindings, and ultra-widescreen support provides an immersive, cinematic experience.

Dishonored is an immersive first-person action-adventure game casting players as a supernatural assassin seeking revenge. The game features a flexible combat system allowing creative elimination of targets through a combination of supernatural abilities, weapons, and gadgets, with approaches ranging from stealthy infiltration to direct confrontation. Set in the industrial steampunk city of Dunwall, where technology and otherworldly forces intertwine, players navigate a narrative of betrayal and corruption as the former bodyguard framed for the Empress's murder. The world reacts to player choices, influencing mission outcomes and the overall game experience, allowing for improvisation and innovation in defining a play style. Players can utilize supernatural powers such as teleportation, possession, and time manipulation, which can be upgraded to master new abilities and gadgets within an intriguing, original world.

Developed by Starbreeze Studios with direction from Josef Fares, the game features a unique single-player co-op experience where players control two brothers simultaneously, each with a thumbstick. This control scheme facilitates puzzle-solving and navigation through varied locations, as the brothers embark on a quest to find the 'Water of Life' to cure their ailing father. Players will encounter boss battles and must rely on each other's strengths to overcome challenges, highlighting themes of reliance and brotherhood in this unforgettable narrative experience.

Out of the Park Baseball 17 is a baseball strategy simulation game that allows players to manage real-world franchises or create fictional baseball universes. As a general manager or field manager, players can guide their favorite MLB teams to glory, manage rosters, lineups, and in-game strategy, or rewrite baseball history by managing teams from almost 150 years past. The game features authentic MLB and MLBPA licenses, including projected Opening Day rosters, complete minor league systems, and future draft classes, with authentic player images and realistic progression. Players can also compete in online leagues. Gameplay encompasses high-level oversight or pitch-by-pitch management, with features like Historical Exhibition mode, historical minor league systems, and AI opponents with individualized approaches to roster management. The game's genres include Indie, Simulation, Sports, and Strategy, offering deep baseball team game management.

Opus Magnum, an indie simulation game from Zachtronics, invites players to master alchemical engineering through intricate, open-ended puzzles. As Head Alchemist Anataeus Vaya, players utilize the transmutation engine, an advanced alchemical tool, to create vital remedies, precious gemstones, and deadly weapons. The game features machine design, allowing players to build apparatuses with programmable arms, customizable tracks, and esoteric devices to carry out alchemical processes. Players can compete globally for the simplest, fastest, and most compact solutions, exporting animated GIFs of their designs. Steam Workshop integration facilitates sharing and playing user-created puzzles. The narrative unfolds amidst intrigues and dark plots within ancient Houses, where powerful alchemists are highly sought and dangerous. For focused concentration, Sigmar's Garden, an alchemy-based solitaire minigame, offers a break.

Guild Wars 2 is a free-to-play Massively Multiplayer online Role-Playing Game focused on exploration and discovery within an open world. Players can embark on adventures, discover landmarks, and interact with characters who have their own stories and goals, with rewards for completing renown hearts and dynamic events. Collaboration is encouraged, as players can assist others without forming parties to tackle challenges like jumping puzzles or world bosses, and experience points are earned through various activities such as reviving players or gathering resources. Character progression involves acquiring and wielding an arsenal of new weapons, with each profession offering unique playstyles refined through hundreds of unlockable skills and traits. Structured player-versus-player (PvP) modes are available, where all competitors are leveled and equipped to ensure fair competition. Deep character customization includes extensive cosmetic options, allowing players to express themselves through weapon and armor skins, and thousands of dye combinations. Expansions introduce new Masteries, including gliding, mounts with special movement skills, fishing, and skiff piloting, alongside elite specializations that unlock new weapon choices and abilities. God of War is an action-adventure RPG set in the Norse realm, where Kratos, years after his vengeance against the Gods of Olympus, lives as a man among Norse gods and monsters, fighting for survival and teaching his son, Atreus, the same. Players can customize controls with various gamepads and mouse/keyboard bindings, and ultra-widescreen support provides an immersive, cinematic experience.

Players will encounter boss battles and must rely on each other's strengths to overcome challenges, highlighting themes of reliance and brotherhood in this unforgettable narrative experience.

Grand Theft Auto V Legacy is an action-adventure game that follows a young street hustler, a retired bank robber, and a psychopath entangled with criminal underworld elements, the U.S. government, and the entertainment industry, requiring them to execute dangerous heists for survival in a city where trust is scarce. The PC version offers exploration of Los Santos and Blaine County at resolutions up to 4K and 60 FPS, with extensive customization options for graphics, controls, and population density. The game includes Grand Theft Auto Online, supporting up to 30 players and featuring all released content, including Heists and Adversary modes. Players can experience the world in First Person Mode and utilize the Rockstar Editor, a suite of tools for capturing, editing, and sharing gameplay footage, including Director Mode for staging scenes with characters, pedestrians, and animals, and the ability to add custom soundtracks via Self Radio. The game also features new music from The Lab FM, hosted by The Alchemist and Oh No, with collaborations from artists like Earl Sweatshirt and Killer Mike.

Set in 1984 during the Cold War, the narrative follows Snake, also known as Big Boss, who awakens from a nine-year coma driven by revenge and establishes a new private army to pursue the shadow group XOF. The game explores mature themes like the psychology of warfare and its resulting atrocities, featuring photorealistic graphics and cinematic storytelling. Its immersive tactical gameplay, open-world structure, and feature-rich design position it as a significant title in the gaming industry.

Out of the Park Baseball 17 is a baseball strategy simulation game that allows players to manage real-world franchises or create fictional baseball universes. As a general manager or field manager, players can guide their favorite MLB teams to glory, manage rosters, lineups, and in-game strategy, or rewrite baseball history by managing teams from almost 150 years past. The game features authentic MLB and MLBPA licenses, including projected Opening Day rosters, complete minor league systems, and future draft classes, with authentic player images and realistic progression. Players can also compete in online leagues. Gameplay encompasses high-level oversight or pitch-by-pitch management, with features like Historical Exhibition mode, historical minor league systems, and AI opponents with individualized approaches to roster management. The game's genres include Indie, Simulation, Sports, and Strategy, offering deep baseball team game management.

Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition is a critically acclaimed RPG that blends adventure, strategy, and deep tactical turn-based combat. Set in the world of Rivellon, players can choose from unique origin characters or create their own, with each choice impacting the narrative. The game emphasizes exploration, allowing for interaction with almost anything and anyone, and offers unlimited freedom to experiment. Combat involves manipulating elements, utilizing the environment, and mastering over 200 skills across 12 schools. Cooperative play is supported for up to four players online or in split-screen, alongside PvP and a Game Master mode for custom story creation.

Opus Magnum, an indie simulation game from Zachtronics, invites players to master alchemical engineering through intricate, open-ended puzzles. As Head Alchemist Anataeus Vaya, players utilize the transmutation engine, an advanced alchemical tool, to create vital remedies, precious gemstones, and deadly weapons. The game features machine design, allowing players to build apparatuses with programmable arms, customizable tracks, and esoteric devices to carry out alchemical processes. Players can compete globally for the simplest, fastest, and most compact solutions, exporting animated GIFs of their designs. Steam Workshop integration facilitates sharing and playing user-created puzzles. The narrative unfolds amidst intrigues and dark plots within ancient Houses, where powerful alchemists are highly sought and dangerous. For focused concentration, Sigmar's Garden, an alchemy-based solitaire minigame, offers a break.

Portal 2 is an action-adventure game that builds upon the innovative gameplay, narrative, and musical elements of its acclaimed predecessor, continuing the legacy of Aperture Science Labs with a focus on puzzle-solving and cooperative challenges. The single-player campaign introduces new characters, puzzle mechanics, and expanded test chambers within unexplored areas of the labs, featuring the return of the AI companion GLaDOS. Its two-player cooperative mode offers a distinct campaign with unique stories and characters, requiring players to collaborate and think in unison to overcome portal-based challenges, a core aspect of the game's physics-driven design. Additionally, Portal 2 includes editing tools that allow players to create and share their own cooperative puzzles through the 'Perpetual Testing Initiative'.
